name: Cryptids Inn Love
description:
How to play:

Click on the people to collect them and to gain money they drop.  Use the money to buy eggs from the store.  You can click on the button to buy new floors to place more eggs.  Wait for the eggs to hatch.  Feed your Cryptids or they will die!  To feed them, right click on them and choose feed.  You can feed them as long as you have enough food (people collected).

Breeding:  (not functional yet) The way breeding them will work is the more time they spend on a floor together the higher their romantic relationship potential will increase. Eventually they will breed and give you a rare mixed cryptid! You as the player can influence breeding by giving the cryptid advice.  You can also move cryptids to different floors to get the combinations you desire!
